snippet: An acquisition would move Pandora, the Internet radio company, into the field of on-demand music, where it would compete with Spotify and Apple Music.
abstract: Pandora Media says it will buy online music service Rdio for $75 million.
lead_paragraph: An acquisition would move Pandora, the Internet radio company, into the field of on-demand music, where it would compete with Spotify and Apple Music.

headline.main: Pandora Plans to Acquire the Assets of Rdio
headline.print_headline: Pandora Media to Buy Assets of Rdio Service
